## Count total nectar plant species

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(ISUmonarch)
library(xtable)
```

```{r, results='asis'}
nectar %>%
  filter(site %in% c("byd1", "byd2", "cra1", "uth1", "uth2", "uth3")) %>%
  group_by(`Nectar Plant Species`, round, site) %>%
  summarize(total = sum(count)) %>%
  tidyr::spread(site, total, fill='.') %>%
  xtable() %>%
  print(type = "html", include.rownames = FALSE)
```
